attributes.action: clarify the policy of congestion charging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Often when unveiling new congestion charging plans the issue of climate change and CO2 emissions are quoted.

Please can the prime minister clarify in full why 4x4 and high CO2 producing cars should be targets under a CONGESTION charging policy.  Surely they should be targeted in a POLLUTION and ENVIRONMENTAL policy?
